## CustomizableFileValue interface

CustomizableFileValue defines the price and sku of a product whose page contains a customized file picker.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CustomizableFileValue 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [file\_extension?](./magento-api.customizablefilevalue.file_extension.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The file extension to accept. |
|  [image\_size\_x?](./magento-api.customizablefilevalue.image_size_x.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The maximum width of an image. |
|  [image\_size\_y?](./magento-api.customizablefilevalue.image_size_y.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The maximum height of an image. |
|  [price\_type?](./magento-api.customizablefilevalue.price_type.md) | Maybe&lt;[PriceTypeEnum](./magento-api.pricetypeenum.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> FIXED, PERCENT, or DYNAMIC. |
|  [price?](./magento-api.customizablefilevalue.price.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Float'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The price assigned to this option. |
|  [sku?](./magento-api.customizablefilevalue.sku.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The Stock Keeping Unit for this option. |
|  [uid](./magento-api.customizablefilevalue.uid.md) | Scalars\['ID'\] | The unique ID for a <code>CustomizableFileValue</code> object. |
